# `DecisionTableOutputColumn` Definition

| Property | Type | Required | Description |
|----------|------|----------|-------------|
| id | `string` | No | The id of the column. |
| defaultsTo | [`DecisionTableColumnDefaultRowValue`](decisiontablecolumndefaultrowvalue-definition.md) | No | The default row value for this column that will be used for an output value where no value  is provided by a row. |
| value | [`OutputValue`](outputvalue-definition.md) | Yes | The output data of this column that will be provided by each row. |
